name: No Turning Back
description:
A strange temple of shifting stone... can you find the way?

My very short, very simple, "puzzle" game for Ludum Dare 35 compo. The theme this time was "Shapeshift". I had a lot of trouble coming up with ideas, but in the end I'm pretty happy with what I have. Enjoy!

Controls:
Move: WASD
Camera: Q and E

Be sure to vote here!
